posts.message:
Greetings...

I'm using XAMPP package to simulate server-side codes in my localhost and I got a strange problem. Whenever I submit data using GET, they show up on the URL while I can't display the received data through "echo" function in PHP after checking that the data were set and they are not empty.

I searched this problem in Google but It seems that I was not able to express it using the right words and the well-known troubles regarding form submission are not applicable to my case.

Any suggestions or ideas would be appreciated =)

Mobile Developer Weekend 2015
posts.description:
Information Technology Institute (ITI) is thrilled to invite you to attend the most exciting event of the year, the Mobile Developer Weekend. MDW2015 comes under the theme of “Power of 1s”. 
It gathers all mobile app ecosystem key players; developers, mobile marketers, mobile operators, device manufacturers, entrepreneurs and industry professionals.
You will go in a tour exploring latest apps, products, technologies, startups, business and opportunities. You can also test apps, play interactive games, enroll in different hands-on interactive workshops and hackathons, and win prizes.

For further information, please contact:

Sherine Taha , Event Coordinator 
staha@iti.gov.eg 
(202) 35355658 
(202) 35355610

Ahmed Youssef , Exhibition Coordinator 
ahyoussef@iti.gov.eg 
(202) 35355683

posts.message:
Why on earth would the Chinese government launch a DDoS attack on GitHub? Anyway, the way they did it is quite clever. Check out the first comment in the thread.

EDIT: apparently the repos targeted by the attack host software that is used to bypass the Chinese great-firewall.
